mapper.select: SELECT si.id, pi.name, si.performance_id, si.fix_date, pi.start_date, pi.end_date, si.open_time, si.start_time, si.ticket_price, si.budget, si.memo, si.implession FROM schedule.information AS si INNER JOIN performance.information AS pi ON pi.id = si.performance_id WHERE si.id = #{scheduleId.value};
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule.information SET fix_date = #{scheduleModify.scheduledDate.value}, open_time = CAST(#{scheduleModify.openTime.open} AS TIME), start_time = CAST(#{scheduleModify.startTime.start} AS TIME), ticket_price = #{scheduleModify.ticketPrice.integerValue}, budget = #{scheduleModify.budget.integerValue}, memo = #{scheduleModify.memo.value}, implession = #{scheduleModify.implession.value} WHERE id = #{scheduleModify.scheduleId.value};
